Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39331 affecting package emacs for versions less than 29.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39331 affecting package emacs for versions less than 29.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package emacs is earlier than 29.4-1, affected by CVE-2024-39331
